name: Skyrider
description:
Pressing the accelerator gives a slight boost but also causes
your engine to heat up, watch the heat meter
Controls
Controller
A to accelerate
B for brake
Left bumper + A for reverse
Right bumper to jump
Left or right on the left analog stick to turn left or right
Start pauses or unpauses the game
Keyboard
Ctrl accelerate
Left Shift + Ctrl reverse
Space bar jump
Alt brake
Left and right arrow keys turns left and right
Escape pauses or unpauses the game
